description.value:
Blessed oils, swabbing clothes, cleaning gels, weapon specific tools and basic spare parts (such as stocks/barrels) typically designed around standard-issue Lasguns. Also included are the appropriate litanties and invocations to the machine spirits required for proper function.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Average

Notes: 20 T
